title: Import Lucene 2.9.1 Collation jar
description: Bring in the collation contrib jar so that we can use CollationKeyFilter and ICUCollationKeyFilter wherever appropriate.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
Correcting Fix Version based on CHANGES.txt, see this thread for more details...
